display_name: [Inklings of Ultimate Power] Super Saiyan 3 Goku (GT) (Golden Giant Ape)

kit.leader_skill: STR Type ATK +35% per STR Ki Sphere obtained

super_attack.name: Super Kamehameha (Extreme)
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises DEF for 1 turn; Causes supreme damage to enemy; Raises ATK for 3 turns

passive_skill.name: The Tail Returns
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 200% up; (Forever) All allies' ATK & DEF 33% up, plus an additional Ki +1 and ATK 33% up for characters who also belong to the "GT Heroes" or "Giant Ape Power" Category; (Once) Medium chance of turning into Giant Ape; When attacking: ATK & DEF 200% up; When there is another "GT Heroes" or "Giant Ape Power" Category ally attacking in the same turn: ATK & DEF 150% up; Chance of performing a critical hit & chance of evading enemy's attack 50% up; When all allies attacking in the same turn are "GT Heroes" or "Giant Ape Power" Category characters: Launches an additional Super Attack; Guards all attacks

lines.text: All allies' ATK & DEF 33% up, plus an additional Ki +1 and ATK 33% up for characters who also belong to the "GT Heroes" or "Giant Ape Power" Category
Medium chance of turning into Giant Ape

lines.context: When there is another "GT Heroes" or "Giant Ape Power" Category ally attacking in the same turn

lines.text: Chance of performing a critical hit & chance of evading enemy's attack 50% up
lines.context: When there is another "GT Heroes" or "Giant Ape Power" Category ally attacking in the same turn
When all allies attacking in the same turn are "GT Heroes" or "Giant Ape Power" Category characters

kit.transformation_conditions: Has a medium chance of turning into Giant Ape (once only)
